text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the ASUS ROG Strix III G GL531GU-WB74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix III G GL531GU-WB74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop!

Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the ASUS ROG Strix III G GL531GU-WB74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Starfield. The build quality of the ASUS ROG Strix III G GL531GU-WB74 15.6" 120 Hz Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 16 GB Memory 512 GB PCIe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
